shriek.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a very high loud sound, especially because you are afraid, angry, excited, or in pain
shriek.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: They were dragged from their homes, shrieking and weeping.
A group of students were shrieking with laughter.
shriek.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to say something in a high loud voice because you are excited, afraid, or angry
shriek.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: ‘I’ll kill you!’ Anne shrieked at him.
shriek.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a loud high sound made because you are frightened, excited, angry etc
shriek.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Ella let out a piercing shriek.
With a shriek of delight, Jean hugged Maggie.
